abstract: Toni Kroos (German pronunciation: [ˈtoːni ˈkʁoːs]; born 4 January 1990) is a German footballer who plays as a midfielder for FC Bayern Munich in the German Bundesliga and the Germany national football team. He is the older brother of Werder Bremen midfielder Felix Kroos.He made his full international debut in 2010 and was a member of the German squads which reached the semi-finals of the 2010 FIFA World Cup and Euro 2012.

He is the older brother of Werder Bremen midfielder Felix Kroos.He made his full international debut in 2010 and was a member of the German squads which reached the semi-finals of the 2010 FIFA World Cup and Euro 2012.
